subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hello,

I'm about to buy this product and I've a question. Is it possible to set a
variable frequency to the effects? For example, that the linear motor rise
the vibration frequency as I increase the car engine RPMs.

Thank you in advance.
Juan

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Manuel Peric,  We do have this feature.

Thank you for your response. And is it possible to assign different
frequency to different effects of the same motor?

Ex. ABS vibrates at 20hz, gear change at 30hz and wheel slip at 50hz on the
same motor.

Thank you!

El lun, 3 nov 2025, 2:21, service@simsonn.com
Hi Juan Manuel Peric,  Your request is perfectly reasonable, and our software can support it. You can also use SimHub to access telemetry data.Â
